trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Oakdale
There were no other sightings in Oakdale on or around November 30th 1975
divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i were hiking,and we heard what sounded like a wounded animalscreaming we jumped up on some rocks peered over and saw a hovering ship-cowbeneath screaming seemed unable to move.i alwaysed wondered why does he not runaway.to the right of ship on ground was a little fellow,my buddy got scared andtook off running.this was 27 or so years ago in sierra nev. mts.there is muchmore later in dreams but i feel better already just talking this much.i am amarried man and work for very large comp.for many years 1 daughter who teaches2nd grade i have a great life but something happened to me,and i want to know.itdoes not rule my life if i never find out thats ok too.maybe hypnosis i dontknowanyway THANK-YOU for listening Mr.Bryan Gullickson
Summary: I saw something 27yrs or so ago. Object hovering over ground, EBE seen near cow.
